sentences.sContent: Their sons are noisy and mischievous.
sentences.sCn: 他们的几个儿子又吵又淘气。

synos.tran: 淘气的；（人、行为等）恶作剧的；有害的

remMethod.val: mis(坏) + chiev(看作achieve， 完成， 达到) + ous → 带来坏结果的 → 有害的

trans.tranCn: 有害的, 恶作剧的, 淘气的, 为害
trans.tranOther: someone who is mischievous likes to have fun, especially by playing tricks on people or doing things to annoy or embarrass them
